ygData.subject: Joy ride
ygData.msgSnippet: The thick forest gives ways to many creatures living in it, going about their natural way of life. A small buck leaps over a fallen log, over to a pond and

Mime-Version: 1.0

Date: Tue, 16 Jan 2001 21:50:11 -0700
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
Subject: Joy ride
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

The thick forest gives ways to many creatures living in it, going about
their natural way of life. A small buck leaps over a fallen log, over to a
pond and bends to sip the clear water, to clench its thirst, before it can
though it perks up. Looking around for danger of a predator it does not
see. Then it starts to sniff, taking in an unatural scent. Quietly you can
hear faint screams getting slowly louder and over the first few trees smoke
rises in twin spires as a cracking sound emerges. Then the buck notices
trees start to fly as the noise becomes audible "yeaaahhh, now that's the
stuff" a gruff voice shouts as the final trees between the deer and the
disturbance rip away to a huge metal semi as it tramples the wildlife. The
buck just manages to leap out of the way (i'm not sadistic mind you) as the
vehicle plows through the pond and on through more trees sending splinters
everywhere. Then when nearing a clearing of rock and grass it hits a jump,
soars ungainly through the air then shrinks and shifts into a grey robot.
As it lands near the rock, a large tremor is felt around the vicinity. He
quickly plunges a fist into the rock until he is shoulder deep in it. Then
he turns leveling a gun at the forest behind him. He smiles and with a pull
of the trigger, a small spinning cyclone erupts from the end and starts to
tear the trees from the earth. He stops and hoists up a larger boulder, a
grinding noise can be heard from his arms as he levels it above his head.
Then after pressing it for a moment he throws it up, and catching it sends
hurteling upward to an uknown section of the forest. "Yeah, this is living"
he shouts triumphantly. Then spining and turning he reverts back into
vehicle mode to plow through more forest.
